attributes.title: terrible and scary
attributes.review: i opened the app the see shrek grinding and honestly im very scared and i DO NOT recommend this app if you are a child of god. 😌

attributes.title: ALL APPS MATTER 👺😼
attributes.review: Why  should this app be special if all apps matter? This ain’t fair man 👨🏻 we need to go to the White House and wapam these cheeto in the face. Trump 2020 on a gravestone.

attributes.title: Destruction
attributes.review: Horrible app, I tried to take my pet chicken for a walk and it kept glitching out.

attributes.title: Froze my Phone
attributes.review: Horrid app. Froze my phone. Had to go to the apple store to get it fixed.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is without a doubt the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. Constant fake news and terrible straw man arguments. Disgusted. SAD!

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review: gross app I genuinely don’t understand why people would download this AND it asks for my location??? Nope not okay.

attributes.title: You’d have to be delusional to give this a 5 star rating
I don’t understand- why the shrek?
attributes.review: Why was there a video of sexy shrek when I opened up the app? I didn’t know trump was a shrek supporter! I hope he understands that shreks the one we want, not him. SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020 SHREK 2020
